channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: What a deal! MSI’s Windows 11 Pro laptop is under $500 and packs an Intel Core 7 150U processor, 16GB RAM, and a 1TB NVMe SSD — but at this price, it could sell out at any moment
item.description: MSI's laptop is now just $499, a staggering $451 off the usual price of $950, but it won't be around for long.

item.title: NordVPN extends phishing and malware protection to your inbox
item.description: NordVPN just launched a new email protection feature to stop phishing in its tracks. It scans and flags dodgy links right inside your browser-based email client on macOS and Windows.

item.title: Ce pack Samsung Galaxy S25 + Chromebook Go est à un super prix chez la Fnac et Darty
item.description: Le Samsung Galaxy S25, actuel fleuron de la marque sud-coréenne, se tient actuellement aux côtés d'un laptop Samsung Galaxy Chromebook Go dans un pack dont le prix a considérablement chuté : la Fnac et Darty le proposent à 899 euros au lieu de 1 468 euros.

item.title: TikTok adds a space for organizing content with others, teases ‘Shared Feeds’
item.description: Shared Feeds will surface new content tailored to both users' tastes, such as sports, winter activities, and their favorite creators.

item.title: Analogue is restocking its 4K N64 and making it more colorful
item.description: As if the Analogue 3D wasn't nostalgic enough, the 4K N64 emulator will soon be available in a handful of transparent "Funtastic" limited editions going on sale on December 10th at 8AM Pacific/11AM Eastern. The vibrant transparent models will be available "in highly limited quantities," and they'll cost more than the standard model at $299. […]

item.title: Samsung just launched the One UI 8.5 beta with 6 big upgrades – here’s how to try it
item.description: The Samsung One UI 8.5 beta is here with new features for all the best Samsung phones –here's how to give it a spin.

item.title: Trump’s EPA Plans to Raise Threshold for ‘Safe’ Formaldehyde Exposure
item.description: The EPA has revised its assessment of the health risks posed by the carcinogen, less than a year after the Biden administration issued its own verdict.

item.title: Uber will start selling trip and takeout data to marketers
item.description: Uber will begin selling customer data to marketers, according to a report by Business Insider. The company's ad division just launched a new insights platform called Uber Intelligence that's tasked with hoovering up and selling trip and delivery data. The data will technically be anonymous, via the use of a platform called LiveRamp. This will "let advertisers securely combine their customer data with Uber's to help surface insights about their audiences, based on what they eat and where they travel." Basically, it'll provide a broad view of local consumer trends based on collected data. Uber g...

item.description: Vous pouvez gagner un smartphone en participant à notre concours #FrandroidOffreMoi. La case 8 de notre calendrier de l'Avent s'ouvre sur le TCL NXTPAPER 60 Ultra !

item.description: The Bissell PowerClean FurFinder delivers capable cleaning without the bells and whistles.

item.title: Skateboarding is better in hell
item.description: Skate Story is two very different things simultaneously. On the one hand, it's a visceral take on skateboarding, providing a tight, fast, ground-level view as you brute-force your way through tricks and combos. But it's also a surrealist trip through the underworld where you control a skateboarding demon who faces off against the devil. Think […]

item.title: 5 great free movies to stream on Tubi, Pluto TV, Samsung TV Plus and more this week (December 8)
item.description: From box office-smashing comedies to underrated fantasy adventures, there’s plenty to watch on the best free streaming services this week.

item.title: 12 Pokémon gift ideas that make up for the lack of TCG stock — trust me, I have a Pikachu tattoo
item.description: It's hard to find the right gift for a Pokémon enthusiast, but don't worry, I've used my 30 years of experience to pick some awesome presents for the holidays.

item.title: Best Guess Live is Netflix's take on HQ Trivia
item.description: Netflix has already committed to reviving Star Search for its streaming service, and now the company is turning its attention to a different type of live show: HQ Trivia. Netflix's Best Guess Live is an attempt to revive the late 2010s app-based show with what the company is calling its first "weekday mobile game show."Best Guess Live will be hosted by Howie Mandel (Deal or No Deal, America's Got Talent) and Hunter March (Sugar Rush) and will broadcast Monday through Friday at 8PM ET / 5PM PT. The game seems like it will lean on multiple choice questions much like HQ Trivia did, and will rewar...

item.title: Voici quel est le meilleur appareil photo hybride de 2025 – Frandroid Awards 2025
item.description: Le meilleur appareil photo hybride testé par Frandroid est le Nikon Z5 II. Découvrez pourquoi ce produit a reçu le Frandroid Awards avec Delos de sa catégorie.

item.title: Petco’s security lapse affected customers’ SSNs, drivers’ licenses and more
item.description: Petco said the exposure was due to an error in an application, and that it is notifying victims’ whose data was affected.

item.title: Heat pump startup Quilt raises $20M Series B to expand sales
item.description: Quilt has sold nearly 1,000 units in the U.S. and Canada, and the new funding should help expand sales operations to more states and provinces.

item.title: Meilleurs ordinateurs portables Acer : notre sélection de PC en 2025
item.description: La marque Acer est un mastodonte sur le secteur des ordinateurs portables. Vous aimez leurs machines mais vous ne savez pas quel modèle à choisir ? Voici notre sélection des meilleurs PC portables Acer à l'heure actuelle.

item.title: The developer behind ICEBlock is suing the federal government
item.description: The makers of ICEBlock, the community-based reporting app for ICE sightings and activity, are suing the federal government, alleging "unlawful threats" made by Trump administration officials led to the app's removal from app stores. The suit centers on free speech violations and accuses the administration of coercing Apple into taking down the app in October. Google began taking down similar apps around the same time. Josh Aaron developed ICEBlock in response to the Trump administration's crackdown on illegal immigration. The app allowed users to pin ICE agent locations on a map as well as add...

item.description: The "AI and crypto frenzy" is threatening American lives, the organizations say.

item.title: Musk Says Starlink, Not NASA, Is SpaceX’s Cash Cow
item.description: Amid media reports of skyrocketing valuation and a potential IPO for SpaceX, the company could have a lot to lose next year.

item.title: The 47 Best REI Cyber Week Outdoor Deals (2025)

item.title: Ce PC gaming Lenovo étire son écran à la demande pour jouer plus confortablement
item.description: Lenovo s’apprêterait à dévoiler un PC portable de la gamme Legion capable d'élargir son écran pour passer d'un format classique à un affichage ultra-large.

item.title: Patient and staff data impacted by Cl0p ransomware attack on Barts Health NHS
item.description: Barts Health was hit through Oracle E-Business Suite, and sensitive data was stolen.

item.title: L’Apple Watch Ultra façon Realme devient encore plus abordable à moins de 40 €
item.description: Avec son look d'Apple Watch Ultra, la Realme Watch 5 est pourtant une montre connectée qui se vend à un prix bien plus accessible surtout avec cette offre : 36 euros contre 69 euros de base.

item.title: Upgrade to the Samsung Odyssey G8 QD-OLED gaming monitor while its at its best price ever
item.description: The Samsung 32-inch Odyssey G8 OLED gaming monitor is down to a new record-low price of $899.99. That beats its Cyber Monday price.

item.title: Finie la jungle de la recharge des voitures électriques : cet abonnement unique à moins de 10 € va enfin vous simplifier la vie en baissant les prix
item.description: Fini le casse-tête des applications multiples et des tarifs opaques. Electra vient de lancer Electra+ Boost, un abonnement unique qui promet de simplifier radicalement la vie des conducteurs de voitures électriques en Europe.

item.title: Paramount makes a $108 billion hostile takeover bid for Warner Bros. Discovery
item.description: Paramount has been none too pleased about Netflix striking an $82.7 billion deal to buy much of Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD). Now, Paramount is making a hostile takeover bid for WBD. It's making its pitch directly to WBD shareholders with an all-cash offer of $30 per share that expires on January 8.Late last week, the WBD board unanimously accepted Netflix's offer of $27.75 per share. That breaks down to $23.25 per share in cash and another $4.50 per share in Netflix stock. Netflix's overall bid is valued at $82.7 billion, while Paramount's totals $108.4 billion. There's a key difference when ...

item.title: Fuite de données chez Lockbit : un chercheur expose l’infrastructure du roi des ransomwares
item.description: Lockbit est victime d'une fuite de données. En exploitant de simples informations publiques, un chercheur en cybersécurité est parvenu à exposer une partie de l'infrastructure du gang.

item.title: Facebook and Instagram will let European users see fewer personal ads
item.description: Meta will soon give Instagram and Facebook users in the European Union the option to limit personalized ads, in an effort to comply with the bloc's tech rules. The European Commission announced that the new advertising options will be rolled out in January 2026, and that this is "the first time that such a choice […]

item.title: Magnetar's new 4K Blu-ray players are the last disc spinners you'll ever need — and they're now available to buy
item.description: MKII versions of the 4K Blu-ray players Magnetar announced at CEDIA 2025 are now available to buy.

item.title: ‘ONE RULE’: Trump says he’ll sign an executive order blocking state AI laws despite bipartisan pushback
item.description: “I will be doing a ONE RULE Executive Order this week,” Trump posted on social media. “You can’t expect a company to get 50 Approvals every time they want to do something.”

item.title: Gift yourself the 45-inch LG Ultragear curved gaming monitor while its almost half off at Amazon
item.description: The 45-inch LG Ultragear curved gaming monitor is on sale at Amazon for $896.99, down from the list price of $1,699.99. That's a 47% discount.

item.title: Starbucks bear cup fans may have another shot at the viral Bearista Cup
item.description: Starbucks posted a cryptic Instagram post that suggests we might have another chance to snag the Bearista Cup. Here's everything we know so far.

item.title: The 22 best gift ideas for the remote worker in your life
item.description:
It’s 2025, so chances are you have at least one person who works remotely on your gift list. While the work-from-home life has its perks — nobody likes a long commute — it certainly comes with its own set of challenges, from missing out on pro-level equipment to dealing with annoyances around the house. If you’re looking to buy a gift for someone who spends much of their time in their home office, we’ve rounded up a few techy ideas that should make their days a little more delightful — or at least easier to manage. Best gifts for remote workers
Check...

item.title: Today is your last chance to grab Proton VPN's lowest price of 2025 — here's how to claim
item.description: Proton VPN's best price of 2025 comes to an end today. It's 75% off its 2-year plans, dropping it to a low only beaten once before. Grab it while you can!

item.title: Frandroid Awards 2025 : pourquoi on a décidé de tout changer cette année
item.description: Les cérémonies de remise de prix, c'est souvent long et un peu ennuyeux. Cette année, pour les Frandroid Awards 2025 avec Delos, on a décidé de tout révolutionner. Pas de plateau télé, pas de direct à rallonge. On a tourné un vrai film de 45 minutes. Ça se passe dans un appartement, c'est drôle, et c'est surtout bourré de tech.

item.title: Genki’s colorful, powerful power strip is 25 percent off
item.description: Power strips are generally pretty boring. You plug stuff into them, then you try your best to hide the strip along with all of the cables feeding into it. But Genki’s Moonbase is meant to be displayed loud and proud on your desk. The retrofuturism-inspired strip we wrote about at the end of last year […]

item.description: L'an dernier, Xiaomi a dévoilé plusieurs téléviseurs LCD d’entrée de gamme sous Google TV, parmi lesquels on trouvait le TV A 32. Un modèle de 32 pouces, donc, qui peut en ce moment vous revenir à seulement 98,97 euros sur AliExpress, alors que la marque le propose sur son site à 129,99 euros.

item.title: The Segway Cube 1000 portable power station is under $330 at Amazon for a limited time only
item.description: The Segway Cube 1000 portable power station is on sale at Amazon for $329.99, down from the normal price of $999.99. That's a 66% discount.

item.title: États-Unis | Trump veut empêcher les États de réguler l’intelligence artificielle
item.description: Donald Trump a annoncé lundi qu’il allait signer un décret dans la semaine pour empêcher les États américains de réguler l’intelligence artificielle (IA) à leur niveau, beaucoup ayant déjà légiféré en l’absence d’un cadre fédéral.

item.description: The US government wants to ensure that apps like ICEBlock don’t make it to online app stores.

item.title: Data centers are throttling home building as infrastructure struggles to keep up with AI demands
